channel.title: Uncover Insights and Truth behind Data on Yicheng Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Uncover Insights and Truth behind Data on Yicheng Huang

item.title: Compare Fake News Detection Performance with Glove and Word2Vec Embedding in Keras
item.description: Background In human society, words carry meaning through symbols. However, despite that symbols are easy for humans to understand, such comprehension has been proven difficult for computational systems. To address this problem, researchers introduced word embedding methods. Word embedding, also known as distributed word representation, represents any given word in vector form. The resulting vector of numbers, known as a word vector, is associated with the meaning of that given word in a mathematical form.

item.title: Estimate Effectiveness of Opioids Control Policies on Drug Overdose Mortality
item.description: Background Over the past two decades, the United States has seen a tremendous increase in the use and abuse of prescription opioids, leading not only to a huge rise in opioid addiction, but also a rise in prescription overdose deaths, and increasingly deaths from non-prescription opioids like heroin and fentanyl as people who became addicted to opioids due to prescriptions turn to illegal markets to sustain their addiction. In order to deal with those situations, several states that had notoriety for having high opioids prescriptions and overdose mortality issued their own policies in different years.

item.title: Predict Transportation Challenges with Logistic Regression and RandomForest
item.description: Background With the rapid pace of social development, we humans have enjoyed an easier way of living and commuting. Meanwhile, we are exposed to a growing number of health-threatening substances and sites, which makes it harder for the medicare industry to evaluate health and its cost. Fortunately, the introduction of Humana’s integrated value-based health ecosystem based on Social Determinants of Health brings a promising prospect to this industry. Among all those challenges to health, transportation challenge stands out to be the most common one since it involves daily life of a person’s commuting, schooling, and living.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction inside AWS Serverless Data Engineering Pipeline
item.description: Background As the scale and size of data grow larger, cloud computing becomes a heated topic and advantageous choice for corporations whose daily operations invlove huge amount of data to consider for computing, storage, and database solutions. This project is aimed at building a serverless data engineering pipeline and transmitting data into SageMaker machine learning models to predict Bitcoin price and cluster community review. Part 1: Web Scrape It contains two sets of lambda function, .

item.title: Continuous Delivery of Flask App Application via GCP
item.description: Background As website functions and business requirements vary day by day, it is important to deploy websites in a continuous delivery framework so that new functions and bug-free version can be updated to end users faster without interrupting the running of websites. This project involves setting up a flask application via Google Cloud Platform and configures cloudBuild to automatically delpoy new changes, which is triggered by a push command in the developer’s github repository.

item.title: Operational Recommendations with SQL for Food Trucks during Music Festivals
item.description: Business Scenario Purdue Mobile Food Consulting (PMFC) is a big data consulting firm headquartered in West Lafayette, Indiana. The company provides advanced insight to food truck vendors that enables them to make well-informed and analytically-driven business decisions to enhance their position in their respective locations or sectors. Sophisticated data capture on food truck locations, suppliers, events, and food trucks themselves allows PMFC to provide clients with an elevated and meaningful view of the entire industry.
